data.text: Abiro wero wend ngʼat ma ahero,
Ne opure maber mogolo kite duto manie iye
“Koro un joma odak Jerusalem to gi jogo modak Juda;
Angʼo machielo mane onego otim e puotha mar mzabibu
Koro abiro nyisou
Bende anaweye kojwangʼore
Puoth mzabibu mar Jehova Nyasaye Maratego
Unune malit, un joma mayo ji utegi ma gisegero
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego osewacho ayanga ka awinjo ni:
Heka apar mar mzabibu nogol mana olemo karaya achiel kende,
Unune malit un joma chiewo gokinyi
Gitimo nyasigi gi kongʼo, gi nyatiti, gi orutu,
Omiyo koro joga biro dhi e twech
Kuom mano piny joma otho ongʼamo dhoge malach
Omiyo dhano nodwok piny
To Jehova Nyasaye Maratego notingʼ malo gi timne makare,
Eka rombe nokwa e legegi giwegi;
Unune malit un joma osiko katimo richo ka umede gi miriambo,
kod joma wacho ni joga niya, “Nyasaye mondo oreti,
Mano kaka nobed malit ne joma luongo tim mamono ni ber
Mano kaka nobed malit ne jogo mariek e wengegi giwegi
Mano kaka nobed malit ne thuondi mag madho kongʼo
Un ma uweyo joketho nikech asoya,
Kuom mano kaka lew mach wangʼo yugi
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye osekecho gi joge;
Otingʼo bandera malo ne ogendini moa mabor,
Onge kata mana ngʼato achiel kuomgi ma ol kata machwanyore,
Asernigi bith
Giruto ka sibuor
Odiechiengno ginirut kuome
